Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and E.raw_text: Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA)
Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and E.proposition: This Court has jurisdiction over this matter pursuant to Massachusetts law governing custody and modification of custody orders and the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA), codified in Massachusetts law.
